questions.question_text: When is the post-processing script executed in XSOAR?

choices.B: Just after the pre-processing is executed
choices.C: Just after the playbook is executed
choices.D: Just after the Close Incident button is clicked
choices.A: Just after the incident is created

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
The post-processing script is executed when the incident is about to be closed, which typically happens after the "Close Incident" button is clicked. This script allows you to perform any final actions or clean-up tasks before the incident is officially closed.

Selected Answer: D
D is correct
